name: Glow Clock for enjoy.your-clock.com
description:
Glow Clock for http://enjoy.your-clock.com Features:
  • Breath backlight (green) for the text
  • Blinking commas
This style compatible with Chrome and Firefox only. Chinese: 发光时钟 http://enjoy.your-clock.com 专用版 功能:
  • 文字绿色背景呼吸灯
  • 冒号闪动
该主题仅适用于 Chrome 和 Firefox 。
additional_info: Attention This style compatible with Chrome and Firefox only. Best fit with LCD font and light green color for default settings. Created by Blueset Studio CC BY-NC Chinese: 注意 该主题仅适用于 Chrome 和 Firefox 。默认搭配LCD字体和亮绿色最佳。 蓝色之风工作室制作 转载请注明出处
